parameters: A few days ago, someone found this letter downstream. It's completely damaged after being soaked in water.
'To Qinghe Times Editorial Office, Qinghe City' was written on the envelope. It was signed by Chen Qingsui.
The letter is soaked and damaged, it's impossible to read what was written.
We speculate based on the fragmentary content that this is a resignation letter.
Ms. Chen probably wanted to quit her job at the press and stay here to continue teaching.
However, this letter didn't make it to the destination.
Press \BK[2]\PK[1] to pull out the paper.
Ms. Chen's funeral is being held in town today.
According to the custom here, there will be fireworks at the funeral.
People believe fireworks can help missing souls find their way.
This is a funeral without the body of the deceased.
But if we spend two, three, five, ten years...looking for Ms. Chen.
Who would hold a funeral for her by then...?
\c[3]Student \c[0]We're here to look for Ms. Chen.
\c[27]Student \c[0]People have been saying that Ms. Chen fell into the water and drowned...
\c[14]Student \c[0]Grandma said if we release lanterns into the water, the people who fell into the water will follow the lanterns and find their way back.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It's dangerous to go near the river. I'll help you release the lanterns.
There are several announcements posted on the public bulletin board.
The report on the tomb robbery
A volunteer teacher of Qingtan Primary School, Chen Qingsui, has passed away at the age of 27. Hereby notified.
——Culture and Education Office of Qingtan Town Government
The report on the tomb robbery
'Recently, Qinghe Times has reported on the tomb robbery in Qingtan Town which has caused an outcry...'

''Qinghe Times’ reporter conducted a secret investigation and found a tomb-robbery syndicate led by Tian that had existed for a long time and had engaged in tomb robbery and sales of cultural relics...'
'As the tomb robbery cases surfaced, the cultural relic trades exposed were even shocking...'
'According to the ledger, which was made public by Qinghe Times, there were hundreds of buyers...'
'Currently, the Qinghe Municipal Government has gathered forces from all walks of life to protect Qingtan’s cultural relics and crack down on illegal and criminal activities...'
